content: Pole Tool 4 - 8 ft ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for drill drivers and screwdrivers- ### FEATURES:Features The pole tool can be turned by hand or using a 1/2 variable speed drill The pole can increase safety by helping to avoid ladders/scaffolds Applications Driving eye lag screws with a hole for suspended ceiling applications to wood Driving eye lag screws with a hole for suspended ceiling applications to metal ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 144 in Technical Data | Length | 144 in ### ITEMS- 289875 - Pole Tool 4 - 8 ft - Package Size 1 pc
